text:
-miti# vRuNIqddhva(gm) ha#vyaqvAha#naqmityA#haq ya Eqva dEqvAnAqM taM ~MvRu#NIta Ar.ShEqyaM ~MvRu#NItEq bandhO#rEqva naityathOq saMta#tyai paqrastA#daqrvAcO# vRuNItEq tasmA$t paqrastA#daqrvA~jcO# manuqShyA$n piqtarO&nuq pra pi#patE || 50
(aSA$ntA - vAhaq pa~jca#daSA - bravIq - danvA#haiq - tayA# - variShyatEq mA - mEkAqnnatriq(gm)qSacca#) (A8)
